entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6.
